items.title: Review customer feedback and fix coverage determination
items.description: Detailed review of February 2026 customer feedback (21 entries, 76% poor rating). Primary issues: (1) Coverage determination errors - system incorrectly identifies excluded components as covered (control arm, water pump, NOx sensors, AdBlue nozzle, high-pressure pump, cylinder head cover vs cylinder head, etc.). (2) Calculation display format needs redesign to show itemized parts/labor with subtotals, VAT, deductible, and total. (3) Data quality - missing odometer photos for km-limited policies. (4) Domain knowledge gaps - some exclusions require repairer confirmation. See docs/customer-feedback-2026-02.md for full analysis.
items.notes: Sub-tasks: (1) Fix coverage rules for 13+ misclassified components, (2) Add cylinder head cover as distinct from cylinder head, (3) Add software updates/adjustments as explicit exclusion, (4) Redesign assessment output format, (5) Add odometer photo validation warning

items.title: Async file I/O for hot paths
items.description: Async file I/O for hot paths for backend performance improvement.
items.notes: Async endpoints exist but all file I/O (auth, users, storage) remains synchronous. Needs aiofiles or thread pool.

items.title: Consider sessionStorage for tokens
items.description: Consider sessionStorage for tokens instead of localStorage for improved frontend security.
items.notes: Using localStorage for tokens. sessionStorage would be more secure but loses persistence across tabs.

items.title: Remove or secure switchUser
items.description: Remove or secure the switchUser functionality in the frontend.
items.notes: switchUser exists in AuthContext.tsx, used from AdminPage. No re-auth required — security risk.
